description: Note that the rechargable battery pack adds an additional unit to the height of the NXT and EV3 bricks. The models of the bricks in LDD show the bricks in their shorter configuration, using AA batteries, so you'll have to keep this in mind when modeling the NXT or EV3 bricks in LDD.

sets.name: SPIKE Prime Set (45678)
sets.description: Studio file requires Philo's 'Spike Prime' parts pack. LDraw file is missing 28T gears.

sets.name: SPIKE Prime Expansion Set (45680)
sets.description: Studio file requires Philo's 'Spike Prime' parts pack. LDraw file is missing 20T and 28T gears and curved racks.

sets.name: SPIKE Prime Base & Expansion Sets (45678 + 45680)
sets.description: The SPIKE Prime base & expansion sets, together in a single file. Studio file requires Philo's 'Spike Prime' parts pack. LDraw file is missing 20T and 28T gears and curved racks.

sets.name: EV3 Core & Expansion (45544 + 45560)
sets.description: The EV3 Core & Expansion sets, together in a single file.

sets.name: NXT Base & Resource Sets (9797 + 9695)
sets.description: The NXT Base & Resource sets, together in a single file.

description: Note that the LXF versions of these sets may not include sensors or hubs.

sets.name: WeDo 2.0 Core Set (45300)
sets.description: Note: lxf file includes Power Functions M-motor in place of WeDo 2.0 motor.

sets.name: Simple and Motorized Mechanisms Base Set (9686)
sets.description: Also called the "Simple and Powered Machines Base Set".

sets.name: Motorized Mechanisms Set (9660)
sets.description: Lose the motor and battery box to get the 'Science & Technology Base Set' (9632). Transparent plastic panels not included.
